# Bootstrap custom
## Version
`3.3.5`

## Custom URL
```
customizerUrl:            http://getbootstrap.com/customize/?id=9f85e1dd0d38428161da6a4582d613d8
```
saved to https://gist.github.com/9f85e1dd0d38428161da6a4582d613d8

## Colors
```
@gray-darker:             lighten(@gray-base, 13.5%)  // #222222
@gray-dark:               lighten(@gray-base, 20%)    // #333333
@gray:                    lighten(@gray-base, 33.5%)  // #555555
@gray-light:              lighten(@gray-base, 46.7%)  // #777777
@gray-lighter:            lighten(@gray-base, 93.5%)  // #eeeeee

@brand-primary:           #DA2E75

@brand-success:           @brand-primary
@brand-info:              @gray-lighter
@brand-warning:           @gray-dark
@brand-danger:            @gray-dark
```

## Scaffolding
```
@link-hover-color:        @gray-light
@link-hover-decoration:   none
```

## Typography
```
@font-family-sans-serif:  'Open Sans', sans-serif

@font-size-base:          14px
@font-size-large:         ceil((@font-size-base * 1.25))  // ~18px
@font-size-small:         ceil((@font-size-base * 0.85))  // ~12px

@font-size-h1:            floor((@font-size-base * 1.8))  // ~25px
@font-size-h2:            floor((@font-size-base * 1.6))  // ~22px
@font-size-h3:            ceil((@font-size-base * 1.4))   // ~20px
@font-size-h4:            ceil((@font-size-base * 1.25))  // ~18px
@font-size-h5:            @font-size-base
@font-size-h6:            ceil((@font-size-base * 0.85))  // ~12px

@headings-font-weight:    700
```

## Components
```
@border-radius-base:      0
@border-radius-large:     0
@border-radius-small:     0
```

## Buttons
```
@btn-default-color:       @gray-dark
@btn-default-bg:          @gray-lighter
@btn-info-color:          @gray-dark
@btn-info-bg:             @gray-lighter
```

## Forms
```
@input-bg:                @gray-lighter
```

## Form states and alerts
```
@state-info-text:         @gray-dark
@state-info-bg:           @gray-lighter
```
